item.title: 认知有县 Podcast
item.description:
Sharing ideas, exploring new products, occasional conversations with friends.

  • Apple Podcast
  • Spotify

item.title: BotDrop
item.description:
Turn your old Android phone into an AI Agent server. Run your private AI assistant at zero cost.

  • Zero infrastructure cost — use hardware you already have
  • Always with you — your agent lives where you live
  • True ownership — your data stays on your device

item.title: OwliaBot
item.description:
Secure crypto-native AI Agent with built-in wallet solution and key isolation design.

  • Key & Agent Process Isolation — keys unreachable even under RCE
  • Sign Tier Risk Control — approval thresholds based on amount and frequency
  • Narrowed Execution Environment — command allowlist, no shell exec
